info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.
info.title: Twilio REST API

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Services for Twilio Proxy. A maximum of 100 records will be returned per page.

post.description: Create a new Service for Twilio Proxy

parameters.description: An application-defined string that uniquely identifies the resource
parameters.name: UniqueName

parameters.description: Default TTL for a Session, in seconds
parameters.name: DefaultTtl

parameters.description: The URL we should call when the interaction status changes
parameters.name: CallbackUrl

parameters.description: Where a proxy number must be located relative to the participant identifier
parameters.name: GeoMatchLevel

parameters.description: The preference for Proxy Number selection for the Service instance
parameters.name: NumberSelectionBehavior

parameters.description: The URL we call on each interaction
parameters.name: InterceptCallbackUrl

parameters.description: The URL we call when an inbound call or SMS action occurs on a closed or non-existent Session
parameters.name: OutOfSessionCallbackUrl

parameters.description: The SID of the Chat Service Instance
parameters.name: ChatInstanceSid

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Phone Numbers in the Proxy Number Pool for a Service. A maximum of 100 records will be returned per page.

parameters.description: The SID of the parent Service resource of the PhoneNumber resource to read
parameters.name: ServiceSid

post.description: Add a Phone Number to a Service's Proxy Number Pool.

parameters.description: The SID of the resource's parent Service
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of a Twilio IncomingPhoneNumber resource
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The phone number in E.164 format
parameters.name: PhoneNumber

parameters.description: Whether the new phone number should be reserved
parameters.name: IsReserved

delete.description: Delete a specific Phone Number from a Service.

parameters.description: The SID of the parent Service resource of the PhoneNumber resource to delete
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the resource
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the parent Service resource of the PhoneNumber resource to fetch
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the resource
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the parent Service resource of the PhoneNumber resource to update
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the resource
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: Whether the new phone number should be reserved
parameters.name: IsReserved

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Sessions for the Service. A maximum of 100 records will be returned per page.

parameters.description: The SID of the Service to fetch the resource from
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the parent Service resource
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: An application-defined string that uniquely identifies the resource
parameters.name: UniqueName

parameters.description: The ISO 8601 date when the Session should expire
parameters.name: DateExpiry

parameters.description: When the session will expire
parameters.name: Ttl

parameters.description: The Mode of the Session
parameters.name: Mode

parameters.description: Session status
parameters.name: Status

parameters.description: The Participant objects to include in the new session
parameters.name: Participants

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Interactions for a Session. A maximum of 100 records will be returned per page.

parameters.description: The SID of the parent Service to read the resource from
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the parent Session to read the resource from
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: The SID of the parent Service of the resource to delete
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: he SID of the parent Session of the resource to delete
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the resource
parameters.name: Sid

get.description: Retrieve a list of Interactions for a given [Session](https://www.twilio.com/docs/proxy/api/session).

parameters.description: The SID of the parent Service of the resource to fetch
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: he SID of the parent Session of the resource to fetch
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the resource
parameters.name: Sid

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Participants in a Session.

parameters.description: The SID of the parent Service of the resource to read
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the parent Session of the resource to read
parameters.name: SessionSid

post.description: Add a new Participant to the Session

parameters.description: The SID of the parent Service resource
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the parent Session resource
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: The phone number of the Participant
parameters.name: Identifier

parameters.description: The string that you assigned to describe the participant
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: The proxy phone number to use for the Participant
parameters.name: ProxyIdentifier

parameters.description: The Proxy Identifier Sid
parameters.name: ProxyIdentifierSid

parameters.description: The SID of the Service to read the resource from
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the parent Session
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: The SID of the Participant resource
parameters.name: ParticipantSid

post.description: Create a new message Interaction to send directly from your system to one [Participant](https://www.twilio.com/docs/proxy/api/participant).  The `inbound` properties for the Interaction will always be empty.

parameters.description: The SID of the parent Service resource
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the parent Session resource
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: The SID of the Participant resource
parameters.name: ParticipantSid

parameters.description: Message body
parameters.name: Body

parameters.description: Reserved
parameters.name: MediaUrl

parameters.description: The SID of the Service to fetch the resource from
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the parent Session
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: The SID of the Participant resource
parameters.name: ParticipantSid

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the resource
parameters.name: Sid

delete.description: Delete a specific Participant. This is a soft-delete. The participant remains associated with the session and cannot be re-added. Participants are only permanently deleted when the [Session](https://www.twilio.com/docs/proxy/api/session) is deleted.

parameters.description: The SID of the parent Service of the resource to delete
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the parent Session of the resource to delete
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the resource
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the parent Service of the resource to fetch
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the parent Session of the resource to fetch
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the resource
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the Service to delete the resource from
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.name: Sid

parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the resource
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the Service to update the resource from
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the resource
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The ISO 8601 date when the Session should expire
parameters.name: DateExpiry

parameters.description: When the session will expire
parameters.name: Ttl

parameters.description: The new status of the resource
parameters.name: Status

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Short Codes in the Proxy Number Pool for the Service. A maximum of 100 records will be returned per page.

parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the parent Service resource
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of a Twilio ShortCode resource
parameters.name: Sid

delete.description: Delete a specific Short Code from a Service.

parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the resource

parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the Service to update the resource from
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the resource
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: Whether the short code should be reserved for manual assignment to participants only
parameters.name: IsReserved

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the resource
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the resource
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: An application-defined string that uniquely identifies the resource

parameters.description: Default TTL for a Session, in seconds
parameters.name: DefaultTtl

parameters.description: The URL we should call when the interaction status changes
parameters.name: CallbackUrl

parameters.description: Where a proxy number must be located relative to the participant identifier
parameters.name: GeoMatchLevel

parameters.description: The preference for Proxy Number selection for the Service instance
parameters.name: NumberSelectionBehavior

parameters.description: The URL we call on each interaction
parameters.name: InterceptCallbackUrl

parameters.description: The URL we call when an inbound call or SMS action occurs on a closed or non-existent Session
parameters.name: OutOfSessionCallbackUrl
